text: Ján Packa (born 25 August 1956) is the former president of the Slovak Police Force the National Police in Slovakia.http://www.minv.sk/?AO_MVSR&subor;=150816 CV Packa Packa joined the Sbor národní bezpečnosti (National Security Corps) in 1976. In 1982 he became Head of the Department of Traffic Protection in Bratislava. Packa assumed office in August of 2006 and his term ended in 2010 when he retired. As of 2013 he works in the Ministry of Interior of the Slovak Republic. ==See also== * List of Presidents of the Slovak Police Force ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Czechoslovak people
title: Ján Packa (police officer)
